name: Treasure Hunter Oscar the Frog
description:
Oscar is a fearless treasure hunter who embark himself in a quest to find the mystical

Tower hidden in the woods to get the treasure that lay inside.

Help Him get trough this place full of puzzles and obstacles to get to the top!

Treasure Hunter Oscar the Frog is a top-down puzzle action game where the player

is tasked to get all the keys of the level to open the exit and go to the

next level. Puzzle of various types get in the way of Oscar and his quest.

Will you manage to help him get to the top?
